com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com macaroni the penguin pattern difficulty medium i assume you already know how to crochet how to crochet in the round how to read a pattern and how to sew pieces together supplies  size g hook  worsted weight yarn red heart super saver works nicely o black you ll need about ½ a skein o white o yellow minimal amount o orange  safety eyes optional gauge is unimportant for this project terms single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase two single_crochet in same stitch decrease = decrease crochet two stitches together double_crochet decrease = double_crochet decrease double_crochet 2 stitches together chain 1 t = chain 1 turn note macaroni is worked in the round i join rounds and i single_crochet in the same space as joining so i m assuming that at the end of each round you are slip stitching to the first stitch of that round and that you chain 1 to start the next round you can work in spirals if that s easier for you just remember to mark your rounds you want your stitches tight and close together so the stuffing doesn t show through later on to start each piece you can chain 2 and work your 6 stitches into the 2nd stitch from the hook or you can use the magic magic_ring use thicker yarn and a bigger hook for a large penguin or use crochet thread and a tiny hook for a miniature penguin be creative and have fun
